CustomField.description: Enter the business phone number you have for this lead. If it is a mobile number, enter it in the Mobile field so we can use it for texting. If you don't have a business phone number, leave this blank.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter the business phone number you have for this lead. If it is a mobile number, enter it in the Mobile field so we can use it for texting. If you don't have a business phone number, leave this blank.
